content:
Dear All,

#14153 is ready for review! Most of the code has been written by Gabriel: my main claim of originality in this PR is denoting by pat an argument to a function.

My initial version was much fuzzier in its matching: it applied more generally, but was more buggy as well.

I am trying to get the fuzzier version working (#14532), implementing a version of this request of Heather's. As you can see from the tests, congrm_1 works, but is not really ready.

Since the non-fuzzy congrm seems to me like a very good addition, though, I welcome any comments on PR #14153 (as well as the rougher #14532)!
